event.description: Chris Getz grounds out, second baseman Alberto Callaspo to first baseman Billy Butler.
Josh Fields called out on strikes.
Carlos Quentin hit by pitch.
Jim Thome walks. Carlos Quentin to 2nd.
Jermaine Dye strikes out swinging.
Paul Konerko singles on a soft line drive to left fielder David DeJesus.
A. J. Pierzynski singles on a line drive to left fielder David DeJesus. Paul Konerko to 2nd.
Alexei Ramirez grounds into a double play, shortstop Mike Aviles to second baseman Alberto Callaspo to first baseman Billy Butler. Paul Konerko to 3rd. A. J. Pierzynski out at 2nd.
Scott Podsednik singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Coco Crisp. Paul Konerko scores.
Chris Getz flies out to right fielder Jose Guillen.
Josh Fields homers (2) on a fly ball to left field.
